body:
Fixes #23673 

This PR automatically copies test source files cached at build time to the test stage directory to

1. Keep the install directory clean; and
2. Facilitate test debugging.

It also ensures that installed binaries are tested (through changes to the package test process).

This process is more consistent with that used to build and run custom test files (https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/packaging_guide.html#adding-custom-files) when appropriate.

TODO

- [x] Add unit test and update those affected by new mock package

The current plan is to update additional packages in separate PRs to reduce the review burden.
title: Stand-alone/Smoke tests: copy cached test sources to test stage
